name: Wormy (PetTurtle)
description:
Web Build Can StutterDescription

It’s raining and wormy does not like the water. Slither away to safety, but does it event exist?

Controls
  • W - boost
  • A - turn left
  • D - turn right
  • P - pause music
  • Space - pause game / continue
Tools
  • Godot - game engine
  • Aseprite - art
  • ChipTone - audio
  • 1BitDragon - music
